text:
ROSS R. BARNETT
GOVERNOR
STATE OF MISSISSIPPI
EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT
JACKSON
May 5, 1961
Hon. Harold E. Hill
Administrative Vice President
National Association of Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington, D.C.
Dear Mr. Hill:
Attached is copy of telegram I have sent Mr. Oren
Harris, Chairman House Inter-State and Foreign Service
Committee. This is being sent to you for your informaÂ¬
tion.
Sincerely yours,
Governor
